TEXT.TITLE: Jesse Sartain
TEXT.PARAGRAPH: Jesse Sartain is the founder and National Director of the American Masters of Taste and the Chefs In America Awards Foundation.

his 25 year legacy includes Gold Medal Endorsement of products in the food & beverage industry as well as giving Chef awards. As a Master of Taste, he has earned the title "America's Palate", having personally tasted over 200,000 products. his numerous awards in the culinary field include Maitre du Gout, USA; Who's Who, James Beard Foundation; Maitre Canardier de France, France; Les Toques Blanches, Global and World Gourmet Society Hall of Fame.
